front.title: NIST customer demographics

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This economic analysis brief summarizes the efforts and results of the data collection and analysis of NIST's CRADA partner information. Summary statistics for CRADA partners are provided for fiscal years 2006 through 2015. Included in the analysis are demographically descriptive variables such as the age, location, industry NAICS codes, number of employees and geographic distribution of NIST CRADA partners. Overall, these features provide an understanding of the demographic characteristics of companies that collaborate on NIST technologies.

seriesInfo.name: NIST economic analysis brief; NIST EAB
